title: Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils, Pre-Sharpened, 2 HB Soft, Yellow, 30 Count
descriptions:
**Product Listing:**

Introducing the Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils, Pre-Sharpened, 2 HB Soft, Yellow, 30 Count. These pencils are a must-have for any writing or drawing activity, offering a smooth and consistent performance. 

Crafted with an exclusive #2 graphite formula, these pencils provide a remarkable writing experience. The thick graphite core ensures consistent lines, making your work stand out. The wood used in these pencils is of premium quality, responsibly sourced from managed forests, reflecting our commitment to sustainability.

With a golden yellow lacquered finish and a matte coating, these pencils have an elegant and sophisticated look. They come pre-sharpened, ready to use right out of the box. 

Not only do these pencils excel in performance, but they also prioritize user comfort. The latex-free eraser effortlessly removes marks without smudging, leaving your work clean and pristine. The signature green & gold ferrule adds a touch of style to these pencils.

Rest assured, these pencils are PMA certified non-toxic, ensuring the utmost safety while using them. 

Ticonderoga, a brand with over 100 years of tradition, is known for its high-quality craftsmanship. Our pencils are preferred by teachers and are part of the esteemed Dixon Ticonderoga family. 

The Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils, Pre-Sharpened, 2 HB Soft, Yellow, 30 Count is the perfect choice for artists, students, and professionals alike. Don't miss out on this exceptional writing instrument.

Introducing the Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils, Pre-Sharpened, 2 HB Soft, Yellow, 30 Count. These pencils have been a favorite among teachers and artists for over 100 years, thanks to their high-quality craftsmanship and exceptional performance.

Featuring an exclusive #2 graphite formula, these pencils deliver smooth and consistent lines, making them perfect for writing, drawing, and shading. The thick graphite core ensures durability and long-lasting use, allowing you to create with confidence.

The wood used in these pencils is premium quality and responsibly sourced from managed forests. Each pencil is coated with a golden yellow lacquer finish, providing a sleek and elegant look. The matte coating adds a touch of sophistication to your writing or artwork.

With the convenience of being pre-sharpened, these pencils are ready to use right out of the box. No more wasting time sharpening before you can start creating. The latex-free eraser removes marks completely without smudging, ensuring a clean and professional result. The signature green and gold ferrule adds a touch of style to these pencils.

Rest assured, these pencils are PMA certified non-toxic, making them safe for both children and adults. The Ticonderoga brand is known for its commitment to quality and safety.

As part of the Dixon Ticonderoga family, this product is backed by over 100 years of tradition and expertise. Ticonderoga is a trusted brand among artists and educators, and their pencils are preferred by teachers worldwide.

Each pack contains 30 pencils, ensuring that you have an ample supply for all your creative needs. Whether you're taking notes, sketching, or coloring, the Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils are the perfect choice for all your writing and drawing projects.

Join the long list of satisfied customers who have experienced the exceptional performance of Ticonderoga pencils. Don't settle for anything less than the best. Upgrade your writing and drawing experience with Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils today.

With their exceptional quality and rich history of over 100 years, Ticonderoga has become a trusted brand among teachers and artists.

Featuring an exclusive #2 graphite formula, these pencils offer smooth performance and consistent lines. The thick graphite core ensures that your marks are always clear and precise. The wood used in these pencils is sourced from responsibly managed forests, making them an eco-friendly choice.

The pencils are finished with a golden yellow lacquer, giving them a beautiful matte coating. The pre-sharpened design allows you to start using them right away. Plus, the latex-free eraser effortlessly removes marks without smudging, leaving your work clean and professional. The eraser is conveniently attached to a green and gold ferrule, adding a touch of elegance to the pencils.

Safety is a top priority, and these pencils are PMA certified non-toxic, making them suitable for all ages. The Ticonderoga brand is known for its commitment to quality and craftsmanship, and these pencils are no exception. They are preferred by teachers for their reliability and performance in the classroom.

Each pack contains 30 pencils, ensuring that you have an ample supply for all your writing and drawing projects. Whether you're a student, artist, or professional, the Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils are a must-have tool for creativity and precision.

Join the tradition and experience the excellence of Ticonderoga today!
